tweet.text: June 1, 1988: See the remarks by General Secretary Gorbachev upon ratification of the INF Treaty at the Grand Kremlin palace during the Moscow Summit. Remarks are available online at the @Reagan_Library: https://t.co/ZzHdRaPqPe https://t.co/53z9EB8V43
tweet.html: June 1, 1988: See the remarks by General Secretary Gorbachev upon ratification of the INF Treaty at the Grand Kremlin palace during the Moscow Summit. Remarks are available online at the @Reagan_Library: go.usa.gov/xQBPF
